comments.raw_text:
1. Pin a page as app tab and close Firefox
2. Open Firefox when you are connected to a network which redirects requests to a login page

The app tab is redirected (if the redirect does not happen, reload the tab)
After landing on the network login page, the back button is grayed out, app tab history is lost.

Expected:
App tabs should not be allowed to get redirected, if this is by design (why?), app tabs should keep the tab history. Happens in 7beta and 9.0a1 (2011-09-07)
comments.author: heraldo99@gmail.com
